title: What Type of Assessment is NWEA MAP?
p1: NWEA MAP is considered a growth assessment
p2: This means MAP can measure ${student.name.possessive} growth from the start to end of a school year, as well as ${student.pronouns.possessive} growth over time.
p3: <sup>*</sup>Growth Assessments similar to NWEA MAP are very common in K-12 Education
